docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Code examples
docs.text:
here is the code

add_nmbers.py
# Function to add two numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

docs.title: code blocks
docs.text:
function1function2 
# Function to add two numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

docs.title: Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: ROS2 package
docs.text: • ros2 package for robot localization: https://github.com/cra-ros-pkg/robot_localization

docs.title: ROS2 package
docs.text: • https://wiki.ros.org/imu_filter_madgwick

docs.title: camera calibration
docs.text: • camera calibration in ROS2: https://medium.com/starschema-blog/offline-camera-calibration-in-ros-2-45e81df12555

docs.title: odometry callibration
docs.text:
• best UMBmark method for callibration: https://solderspot.net/2014/05/08/navbot-error-correction-using-umbmark/
    • https://www.dprg.org/calibrating-your-robot-using-umbmark/
    • http://thetechnicgear.com/2014/06/howto-calibrate-differential-drive-robot/
    • original research paper: https://johnloomis.org/ece445/topics/odometry/borenstein/paper60.pdf

docs.text: • https://ros-mobile-robots.com/processing_units/ros-network-setup/

docs.title: Vbot
docs.text: i like to drink after i play with my robot

docs.title: microcontroller
docs.text: • filtered velocity is off now

docs.title: gazebo plugins
docs.text:
• i have disabled the publishing of tf between the odom and the base_footprint.
  • in the diff drive plugin , i have enabled the wheel_tf

docs.title: EKF plugins:
docs.text: • map_frame is turned off

docs.title: udev rules for the vbot
docs.text:
• Lidar: /dev/rplidar
  • esp32 microcontroller: /dev/esp32
  • logitech webcam 1 : /dev/logi_webcam1
  • logitech webcam 1 : /dev/logi_webcam2
  • fisheye webcam: /dev/fisheye_usbcam

docs.title: interfaces
docs.text: Sim Robot- gazebo classic Sim Robot- gazebo Fortress Real robot /robot_description /robot_description /robot_description /joint_states /joint_states /joint_states /cmd_vel /cmd_vel /cmd_vel    (microros side) /odom /scan /scan /scan /tf /tf /tf /tf_static /tf_static /rgb_camera/image_raw /rgb_camera/image_raw /rgb_camera/camera_info /rgb_camera/camera_info /oakd/rgb/camera_info /oakd/rgb/image_raw /oakd/right/image_raw /oakd/right/camera_info /oakd/left/image_raw /oakd/left/camera_info /oakd/depth/image_raw /oakd/depth/points /imu/data_raw ~~/imu~~ /imu/data_raw /drift /encoder_info       (microorosside) /set_wheel_velocities (for debugging)    (microros side) /battery_voltage         (microros side) /status_microcontroller         (microros side)

docs.title: PID parameters tuning
docs.text: Kp KI Kd comments 0.5 3.0 0.1 sets quickly … di not realise any problem 0.5 3.0 0 sets quickly … Did not notice any change after setting Kd = 0 0.5 2.0 0 sets quickly … Did not notice any major change after lowering Ki to 2.0
